name: Average Metallica Lyrics Quiz | 10 Questions | Music

questions.text: Name the song: 'Make his fight on the hill, in the early day'
Name the song: 'Turn on, I see red, adrenaline crash, crack my head, nitro junkie, paint me dead'
This song was sung in concert with Ted Nugent, Kid Rock, and Sevendust: 'Get up, everybody's gonna move their feet, get down everybody's gonna leave their seat'
questions.correct: Detroit Rock City & Detroit rock city & detroit rock city

questions.text: Name the song: 'Ash to ash, dust to dust, fade to black'

questions.correct: Seek and destroy & Seek and Destroy & seek and destroy
